name: Pet Shop
description: A store selling domestic animals and pet supplies; adventurers can purchase companions, buy animal care items, or find unusual pets from distant lands.
atmosphere: The shop is filled with the lively sound of animals and the scent of pet food and clean bedding. The air carries the promise of companionship and the essential nature of animal care, while the atmosphere crackles with the energy of life and the joy of finding the perfect companion.
